phrases: Yes, and they are the wild hunters.

Okay?

What do you mean?

Fine!
Bring it, cage!

Stanbot?!

Wild Hunt is the best!

Just what are you trying to do here?!
Just what are you planning to do?
There is nothing you can do to stop me from reaching them.
There is not a single thing you can do about it.
This is the Wild Hunt?
Yes, and those guys are the wild hunters.
They are aces who are specially trained to catch all of the ghosts within twelve days.
You have got to catch all of this year's ghosts before the year ends.

On the final day, the twelfth night.

Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
Is Constanze here?
Oh, Akko.
Cons is out right now.
Oh...
You need her for something?
Actually...
I broke her Stanbot.
She is going to be pissed.
Thing is, she dragged us into helping her build a weapon for the Wild Hunt.
Why is she working on that?
Because she is going to be in the Wild Hunt.
Seriously?!
For real?
Professor Croix gave her special permission to enter.
Wow, that is awesome.
Ah, that...
Ow...
Whoa, what is all this?
Constanze!
YOU-Um...
Sorry!
I broke your Stanbot!
I am really sorry!
But it was an accident!
Forgive me, okay?
Please!
I will help you out with anything you want in exchange!
Wait, wait!
Just calm down!
We can talk this out!
Are you okay?
That does sound rough.
But we all know that Akko's help is anything but.
What is that supposed to mean?!
Yo.
What are you doing?
Running some errands in Stanbot's place.
Though it is really just taking stuff to our room.
Give Me that!
I will do it.
She leaves me no choice but to force my help down her throat!
Constanze!
I brought it!
Wow, that looks amazing!
Sorry!
Here you go!
I cooked for you!
Constanze!
Constanze!
Constanze!
Constanze!
Constanze!
Constanze!
Let me out!
I cannot help you like this!
What do you mean?
You want to do it all yourself?
Fine!
Try and hold me back, cage!
Metamorphie Faciesse!
Whoa!
This is what she is using for the Wild Hunt?
Hey, I was just thinking...
Are not we kind of similar?
Ever since we were little, we were obsessed with just one thing!
It did not matter what anyone else said about it!
We just go straight down the path we have chosen!
Do not you agree?
Come on, there are some things you cannot do alone...
Akko!
Bother!
Constanze wants to be alone!
Stanbot?!
He is multiplying...
Go away!
Go away!
Go away!
H-Hey
Go away!
Go away!
Hold on!
Go away!
Go away!
Hey, that was fast.
You do not need to force yourself to help her.
It is not like Constanze has asked you, either.
Even I know that, but still...
You just want to bother Constanze then?
No way!
Of course not!
Then just let her do what she wants.
I think she just honestly prefers being alone.
Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
Hey, Akko.
You finally give up on Cons yet?
I want this.
Not happening.
That is an important cooking utensil.
It is not a toy.
Plus, you are getting in the way of my work.
Shoo, shoo.
Hey.
Have you heard of the Wild Hunt?
Here!
The orichalcum whisk!
You need it to build your boat, right?
When I explained why we needed it, he let us borrow it until the Wild Hunt ends.
After I said you would be participating...
That is incredible!
He got all excited.
The Planta Tartarica Barometz grows on sacred land that is forbidden to trod on.
I cannot simply tell you its location.
Listen: this is not an issue of money.
It is most certainly not an issue of money!
Barometz?!
I know what that is!
It is the plant that grows into a golden sheep!
Barometz
There is no plant as efficient as Barometz Soft fleece surrounds its supple meat
Fountain of Polaris
The magic fountain that reveals the path of light located at Luna Nova.
It bestows the great magic power of the stars unto the witch with hidden radiance.
It is on one of the Chariot cards!
I know where to find it too!
Leave this to me!
Hey!
You are taking that without paying as much as a penny?!
But you said it was not an issue of money!
Metamorphie Faciesse!
Here!
A Planta Tartarica Barometz!
I am not really skilled or clever like you are, but I am confident in my stamina and ability to take action.
If you let me handle the things you are not good at, do not you think we will be able to make something truly amazing?
It is fine to do some things alone,
but together we will be able to do the impossible!
Are these... materials for the ship?
So then...
You want me to collect them, right?
Okay!
I will do it!
Let us work hard together, Constanze!
Akko, what are you doing?
I thought up an idea of my own, so I drew a picture of it.
Show it!
Show it!
Impossible.
Cannot be done.
A childish delusion.
Oh, stuff it!
You cannot expect me to be as good as Constanze.
Are you an idiot?
Amateurs are scary.
Beginning to doubt sanity.
You do not need to go that far!
Go away!
Sorry, did I wake you?
Man, watching you kind of made me think that anything really is possible.
So I tried coming up with something like an ultimate magic mecha.
But yeah, I guess there is no way this would work... right?
Constanze?
Ghost hunt.
How could I possibly let such an entertaining chance slip by?
It is today!
The final day of the Wild Hunt!
The rumors were about this place, right?
I think I felt a presence just now!
If you buy some of these goods, you will get spared some of the bad ghost mojo, probably.
What is going on?
It seems that talk of a ghost sighting in the plains around Blytonbury went viral online last night.
I think that is what drew all these occult fans here.
It is not like normal people can even see the ghost hunt.
Who the hell let it leak?
Things are going to get messy.
It could not be...
Look!
They are here!
I wonder when it will start.
When are they supposed to appear?
It must have been fake.
Just a bit longer!
You think?
Is the wind picking up?
Did you... just feel a chill?
All right!
Captain!
Let us raise the anchors!
Bon voyage!
They are here!
It is Constanze and Akko!
Constanze!
Damn awesome!
That is the stuff!
Go.
Is not it getting kind of noisy?
Hey, what the hell're those?!
Those are...
Captain, there is trouble!
What in the world is this thing?!
Got it!
Constanze!
Let us do that!
Let us Metamor-formation!
Burning souls turned into magic power!
The seven shining stars of justice!
A believing heart is our magic!
Magic Suit Grand Charion!
On stage!
What is that?
Those guys are such morons.
So cool!
We nailed it!
My idea was a perfect success!
You are a real genius, Constanze!
Why are not we moving?
We are out of magic power!
You mean we used it all up for the transformation?!
But we had so much of it!
That is it!
Attention, hunters!
If this goes on, the Wild Hunt will be ruined!
Please, lend them your strength!
Magic at one hundred and twenty percent!
Now, Constanze!
Grand Charion Big Wheel!
Miracle Magical Shining Tornado Punch!
Wild Hunt rocks!
We did it!
I guessed correctly.
What it is that you did.
An experiment.
You caused a panic among the people to gauge their rise in emotional energyfuel spirit.
Am I wrong?
Just what are you plotting?!
You will find out soon enough.
That no matter what my goals are...
There is not a single thing you can do to stop me.
For me?
It is thanks for helping her out.
Really, you did not need to do this.
So cool!
And slow.
But I am flying on a broom!
You call that flying?
Thanks, Constanze!
